function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Contamination risk from vr equipment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase of displayed covid-19 guidelines, warnings, and obligations in stores","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambient conditions of physical servicescape, including background music and noise levels","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission through physical contact with payment devices and surfaces in stores","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate space in stores can lead to crowded and congested environments, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of products in stores may lead to increased physical interactions and longer shopping durations, contributing to disease transmission","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to contact with products in stores","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological reactance leading to anti-social behavior such as increased touching of products","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased waiting lines and congestion at store entrances due to limited capacity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biometric surveillance measures , face recognition, gps tracking creating privacy concerns","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health screening measures may be perceived as invading personal privacy","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of physical servicescape changes on customer experience cx due to pandemic challenges","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of voice assistants and social robots may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases by allowing interactions without physical contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virtual reality and holographic technology may create an illusion of physical presence, leading to reduced adherence to physical distancing measures","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of humanoid service robots in retail environments may lead to increased physical interactions and close contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for human-to-human contact during in-store shopping or pick-up","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced social interaction due to technology-mediated solutions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for sales and interactions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shoppers may feel on edge and try to keep a distance from other shoppers and employees","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long queues at the store entrance may increase fear of contamination and negative feelings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased store crowding can lead to fear of contamination and decreased customer satisfaction","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impacts of covid-19 measures on utilitarian and hedonic shopping value","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fear of contamination causing barriers to visiting stores and using services","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced social interaction due to social distancing measures in shopping environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited opportunity for enjoyable shopping experiences due to restrictions and fears related to the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination fear leading to lack of tactile input when shopping for products, both online and in-store","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 social distancing measures leading to long queues and reduced shopping efficiency","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased adoption of e-services and online retailing due to the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in consumer privacy attitudes due to covid-19 crisis","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in consumer behavior towards online shopping and e-commerce","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing measures in stores","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsanitary surfaces and lack of hand disinfecting points","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unregulated use of cash payments","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consumers’ fear of contamination and increased reluctance to get close to other people and potentially contaminated objects","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe metamorphosis in the service sector, driven by government regulations safeguarding public health and consumers’ mindset","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overnight change to the physical and social servicescape in response to the containment measures and consumers’ fear of contamination","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to close contact in retail settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of retail establishments leading to economic impact","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited resources of the government may impact the effectiveness of support for consumer loans in housing and automotive industry","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Backlog in car production due to surge in demand after support for consumer loans","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased cooperation between government and financial sector may lead to efficient management of economic crises","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased marketing expenditures in banking and food service industries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accurate pandemic predictions and forecasts","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of trust and reassurance among consumers","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of fast and deliberate response to the crisis","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cognitive trust through untact channels and strong relationships in banking services","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to act quickly on learnings and develop innovative service products for food service businesses","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to face-to-face contact in food service industry","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of decreased customer confidence in banking services","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures in restaurants and cafes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
